channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPlus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPlus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4974|2024-10-16T06:43:30.014Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%E2%80%93%20live%20chat%20for%20wordpress%2C%20buddypress%2C%20peepso%2C%20ultimate%20member%2C%20buddyboss
item.description: The Freemius SDK, as used by hundreds of WordPress plugin and theme developers, was vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery and Information disclosure due to missing capability checks and nonce protection on the _get_debug_log, _get_db_option, and the _set_db_option functions in versions up to, and including 2.4.2. Any WordPress plugin or theme running a version of Freemius less than 2.4.3 is vulnerable.

item.title: CVE-2024-32802|2024-08-02T02:20:35.514Z -- wordplus -- bp%20better%20messages
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WordPlus BP Better Messages allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BP Better Messages: from n/a through 2.4.32.

item.title: CVE-2024-32802|2024-06-04T17:51:04.742Z -- wordplus -- bp%20better%20messages
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WordPlus BP Better Messages allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BP Better Messages: from n/a through 2.4.32.
